name: LAB SIMULATOR 9000
description:
LAB SIMULATOR 9000 is a short game about conducting super legitimate and totally scientific research in a rundown lab. 

CONTROLS

Click and hold most objects to select them and drag to move. A mouse is highly recommended.

R- restart at any point. Physics are a bit wonky so this will come in handy!

OTHER STUFF

If you find non-physics related bugs, just drop them in the comments. It might take a while to load if you're using Chrome, so I've included a Windows build you can download as well. Otherwise have fun and break stuff !
